#Text= Asami says : " I 've noticed how you treat Korra , how you acted when she was missing .

column1: #Text=You have feelings for her , do n't you ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Things are crazy right now .

#Text=" Asami says : " Well , there might not be a relationship to worry about later .
#Text=It was time to man up and call it quits .
